channel.title: Help with weapon >.<
channel.description:
Hey guys, I am unsure whether this is in the right place, because I don't know how to fix the problem so I am not sure if it is in my client side or my server side... So if this is in the wrong section, please tell me and I will immediately move it :)
Anyway, I am using a source a client called PwnScape. When I carry a Godsword, i carry it vertically, not like any other 2H. If someone could tell me where i change it and how i change it, i would really appreciate it...
Thankyou ~ Ziege Terra ~

item.title: Help with weapon >.<
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Okay, thanks a lot man, I will get right to it now. Salute

Also, do you know the anim for a godsword, Cause i am sort of a noob, at least with weapon edits…

Thanks alot.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2009, 03:15:25 am[/size][hr]Hmm, still doesn’t work, i made it the same stand ID as the Dragon 2H… [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2009, 07:14:19 am[/size][hr]Alright, don’t worry… I got it sorted, i was just using a weapon ID that didn’t exist, apparently.

Thanks a lot Faded Vision ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: Help with weapon >.<
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

Okay my source so I can help you there.

Open Client.java

Find

public int GetStandAnim(int id)

Look for below it

if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100)

Below that it will say return then the emote id

return 0000;

Change it to whatever you like

Read full topic
